caption.p: Tissue manufacturing process. To obtain safe tissue grafts, the procurement team is responsible for several tasks depending on local hospital logistics; usually they conduct the donor’s recruitment, informed consent, clinical history evaluation and donor testing. Harvested tissues remain under quarantine until all test results come back negative and the tissue can proceed with the processing. For this, general laboratory, microbiological and serological tests are performed according to Chilean Technical Standard No. 200 (Ministerio de Salud 2018). After implantation, all tissues must undergo an established follow up, commonly known as bio-vigilance period
